Value.label: Overcurrent protection state
Value.Help: If the current exceeds 16A for more than 5 sec, the load will be switched off.

Value.label: Remember device status after power failure
Value.Help: Define how the plug will react after the power supply is back on.

Value.label: Send status in Lifeline when Load status change
Value.Help: Smart Plug can send notifications to associated devices in Lifeline when the status of the plug is changed

Item.label: Send Basic Report only when Load status is not changed by Z-Wave Command
The LED follows the load status
When operating plug, the LED is lit for 5 seconds

Value.label: Send report on change of power consumption (W)
Value.Help: This parameter will send a power report automatically if the power value changes of x W (Watts) compared to the last report

Value.label: Send report on change of power consumption (%)
Power (W) report interval
Value.Help: This parameter defines the period of sending power reports. 0=Disabled, 5-2678400 seconds

Value.label: Energy (kWh) report interval
Value.Help: This parameter defines the period of sending energy reports. 0=Disabled, 5-2678400 seconds

Value.label: Voltage (V) report interval
Value.Help: This parameter defines the period of sending voltage reports. 0=Disabled, 5-2678400 seconds

Value.label: Current (A) report interval
Value.Help: This parameter defines the period of sending current reports. 0=Disabled, 5-2678400 seconds
